law.catch_line: Limitation of liability for negligent disclosure of program participant's actual address.
law.text: No actionable duty or any right of action shall accrue against the state, a county, a municipality, an agency of the state or county or municipality, or an employee of the state or county or municipality in the event of negligent disclosure of a program participant's actual address.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 87, sec. 9, effective June 25, 2013.
